main_topic.author: philipha2
main_topic.title: How do you guys normally improve or edit the strategy of the model?
main_topic.content:
By looking at game logs? 

I am just curious of the approach

comments.author: RS Turley
comments.content: Personally, I find the game logs of the public matches to be somewhat helpful, but they are less useful when your the other agent isn’t very intelligent—like the bots that always say “no” or always ask the same question. Sadly, that happens far too often, so I think I found more value from just running matches in a notebook.
comments.date: Posted 14 days ago  ·  62nd in this Competition

comments.author: VolodymyrBilyachat
comments.content: I have locally run book which would run my two agents together. that way i can debug and improve slowly
comments.date: Posted 13 days ago  ·  215th in this Competition
